name: precision-calculator
description: 一个高精度的JavaScript数学计算库，解决浮点数精度问题，包含增强功能如配置管理、国际化、性能优化、日志记录等

scripts.benchmark: node -e "const { BenchmarkTester } = require('./precision-calculator'); const b = new BenchmarkTester(); console.log('Running benchmarks...'); b.benchmark('Basic Operations', () => { const calc = require('./precision-calculator'); calc.add(Math.random(), Math.random()); }, 10000);"
scripts.build: echo 'Build completed - no compilation needed for JavaScript'
scripts.coverage: echo 'Coverage report - no coverage tool configured'

author: Your Name
